content.p: We will guarantee you a room in University-arranged accommodation for your first year if you: For added peace of mind, free cancellation, no penalties if you do not obtain your grades, defer* your place or are unable to obtain a visa. Full Terms and Conditions, including on cancellation, will be in your accommodation contract. Notification of cancellation to the University must be received by 31 August 2024 for all programmes, except presessional courses in respect of which the deadline for notification is 15 September 2024. You wonâ€™t be able to cancel your accommodation if you have started living in it. * Deferral must be for a full academic year.
